name: Deep Sickness
description:
Deep Sickness

Your are sick, your sickness makes you cough when you try to climb, your only option is to go down, deeper and deeper in the forest...

This is a small platformer game, made in 48 hours for Ludum dare 48. I took the "Compo" challenge for the first time, meaning that only one person have to do every aspect of the game from scratch. Overall a fun experience! but there no music
